SHORTDESC: Able to carry out all normal activity without restriction
Restricted in physically strenuous activity, but able to walk and do light work
Able to walk and capable of all self care, but unable to carry out any work. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours
Capable of only limited self care, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours
Completely disabled. Cannot carry on any self care. Totally confined to bed or chair
